MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 postcode area of Duns, affecting properties in Langtongate and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.06pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation required. Our team are onsite at Willis Wynd Substation and tried to replace the fuse however this is not holding. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:02PM on Friday 05 February 2021.
